I think tf.contrib.layers.linear has been removed in the latest version. And for functional interface, you should use inputs, rather than inputs_size.

Take dense layer for example, tf.layers.Dense is the layer class, and its functional interface named tf.layers.dense. The layer class uses input_shape to build it, while functional interface requires inputs.

body:
I think `tf.contrib.layers.linear` has been removed in the latest version. And for functional interface, you should use `inputs`, rather than `inputs_size`.  

Take dense layer for example, `tf.layers.Dense` is the layer class, and its functional interface named ` tf.layers.dense`.  The layer class uses `input_shape` to build it, while functional interface requires `inputs`.
